content.bullet: 1101.1 Scope** — Applies to storm drainage design, construction and materials.
1101.2 Disposal** — Stormwater must discharge to approved disposal locations.
1101.3 Prohibited drainage** — Stormwater cannot enter sanitary sewers.
1101.5 Change in pipe size** — Must not reduce in direction of flow.
1102.2–1102.4** — Describes material standards for inside, underground, and storm sewer pipe.
1113.1.1–1113.1.4** — Requirements for pump capacity, sump construction, electrical, and piping.
